name: Hybrid/Fallback Contracts
description: Hybrid contracts providing balanced defaults for composite, mixed-mode, or unclassified contracts that don't fit cleanly into TYPE_A-E categories.

epistemic_ratios.description: Distribution of computational effort across epistemic layers

n1_empirical.justification: Balanced extraction across multiple evidence types

n2_inferential.justification: Balanced inferential processing for mixed-mode reasoning

veto_threshold.description: Probability threshold for N3 veto gate activation

fallback_threshold.description: Minimum confidence before falling back to alternative methods

permitted.name: veto_gate
permitted.description: Standard veto gate without extreme strictness

operations.note: SUBTIPO_F is a fallback: allow broad operations with conservative thresholds

fusion_strategies.description: Canonical fusion strategy per epistemic layer

sample_questions.description: SUBTIPO_F has no dedicated base questions
sample_questions.note: Fallback for unclassified or hybrid contracts

fallback_mode.description: Enable graceful fallback to alternative methods

conservative_thresholds.description: Use conservative thresholds to minimize false positives

graceful_degradation.description: Enable graceful degradation when primary methods fail

adaptive_weighting.description: Enable adaptive weighting based on evidence quality
